about_the_game:
A single game developed by TerkStudios, developement started on 2015,but the game took relevance in 2017 with muntiple themes and dynamics. Today it's called Loneliness, a game inspired on the title itself.

The game shows how lone can someone feel when there is no one like you

Check out my friends website,sometimes he will post things about Loneliness:
detailed_description:
A single game developed by TerkStudios, developement started on 2015,but the game took relevance in 2017 with muntiple themes and dynamics. Today it's called Loneliness, a game inspired on the title itself.

The game shows how lone can someone feel when there is no one like you

name: TerkEngine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6500 CPU @ 3.20GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 900 4G video
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Blaster Audigy Rx
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 , 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7 6700K Skylake 4.1 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6G video
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA Hight Definition Audio

short_description: Loneliness is a survival experience, mainly targeted on survive and improve your technology and build a citizen.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
